reviews.review: Most people don't understand that this is a Thanos movie. It's a heist. The last arc is fantastic and the score is clearly one of the best I've seen in a superhero movie. The dialogues and the acting are both phenomenal, as are the cinematography and the CGI. There's a lot of heart and soul in this movie, and it's breaking records both worldwide and domestically because people can appreciate quality.

ITS AWESOME and sad . . .
totally watch it if you haven't

i agree with the audience score, the tomatometer score is not genuine enough, the movie was amazing, there were some plot issues which could have been improved,however, the main plot is awesome. The visual effects and cgi is absolutely stunning.Although, Thanos cgi is sometimes off and disturbing.In the end, its a movie which i would watch again and again, its spellbounding!!!!! 84% undermines the movie, it should have around 92%,in my opinion!!!!!
The best movie of marvel. Low ratings can be only explained because of people havent seen the previous movies or they dont know nothing of superhero movies. Cant wait for the next one!
It's definitely an ambitious movie of the MCU. Beside the epic scences, there are also the heart touching moments which can probaly make you cry.
Amazing that Marvel understands the dynamics of space better than Star Wars does.  This was an amazing story that was VERY well told.
Everything was balanced the Russo's get it perfect

As a setup for the next movie, this was good. I expected it to be heavy on action, and dark; and it was. When the lighter moments came, they came almost too quickly to catch. Thano's backstory was welcome but I wish there'd been more response to young Gamora's question about the price he paid. Current CGI can do only so much to convey those feelings. Lots of questions remain, and I look forward to seeing how the heroes respond. Stark's not the only one wondering about Strange's last words.

This isn't just a good movie, it's a good film. The story is beautiful, the execution of story telling is flawless, and the pace of plot is perfect. My most favorite part of this story is the portrayal of Thanos as an anti-villain. Say what you will about the unwitting scoundrel reluctantly doing the right thing and saving the day. This character believes he is doing something necessary to save everyone even though it he knows it's unthinkable. You can see the struggle he goes through and the loses he endures to finish the job he believes he has to do.  He's a character you would love to hate but his motive are not self serving, so you just hate to love him. All of the Avengers unite to become an unstoppable force brought to bare against an immovable object, Thanos. Their portrayal is spot on and everyone was perfectly placed through out the story. There are no empty spaces in this movie, and it's pace is never slow. So you have keep hold of your popcorn and beverage, because this is movie is a wild ride. This is Marvel's best masterpiece yet.
I loved Avengers Infinity War!!! It is a great movie!!
